title: Thundershowers expected in several provinces
content: The Department of Meteorology says showers or thundershowers will occur at times in Northern, North-Central, Eastern and Uva provinces and in Matale district.Showers or thundershowers will occur at several places in Western and Sabaragamuwa provinces and in Kandy, Nuwara-Eliya, Galle and Matara districts during the evening or night.General public is kindly requested to take adequate precautions to minimize damages caused by temporary localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.
